  • Uses of Card in Unnamed Package

    Subclasses of Card in Unnamed Package
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CardGolden
    The CardGolden class extends the CardResource class by adding constraints to its playability and generally increasing the points awarded when played.
    class 
    CardResource
    The CardResource class is the most common implementation of the Card class in the game.
    Resource Cards always have a resource and some of them can give points when placed.
    class 
    CardStarter

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Card
    CardPlacement.getCard()

    Card
    Game.getResourceCardVisible1()
    Method to access the first visible resource card.
    Card

    Card
    Deck.peek()
    Method returns the card in the Arraylist in position [0] without removing it.
    Card
    Deck.pop()
    Method removes and returns the card in the ArrayList in position [0].

    CardPlacement(Card card, Coordinates coordinates, boolean isFaceUp, boolean[] cornerVisibility)
    Default Constructor.

    Deck(ArrayList<Card> deck)
    Default Constructor.
